description: A pipeline configuration that extracts clinical narratives from OHDSI CDM, runs a MedTagger NLP rulesets, and outputs back to OHDSI CDM.

config._desc: An example configuration to extract notes from mssql OHDSI CDM instance, replace values as appropriate
Runs NLP. In this case, we use pasc ruleset that is bundled by default as an example
config._desc_ctd: Note: you will need to install the MedTagger Backbone Component found at https://www.github.com/OHNLP/MedTagger

config._desc: Converts MedTagger output to OHDSI format
config._desc_ctd: Note: you will need to install the MedTagger Backbone Component found at https://www.github.com/OHNLP/MedTagger

config._desc: Writes MedTagger output to file with JSON objects separated by newlines (JSONL)
config._desc_ctd: Note: Can have extra columns that need to be filtered to get NOTE_NLP format
